damson-in-distress.title: Damson in Distress
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling Apple with Davidson plum
damson-in-distress.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

myrtle-beach.title: Myrtle Beach
ingredients: Bickford and Sons sparkling lemon and lemon myrtle
myrtle-beach.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

the-grapes-of-wrath.title: The Grapes of Wrath
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling Red grape and hibiscus
the-grapes-of-wrath.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

where-the-wild-things-roam.title: Where the Wild Things Roam
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling pear and wild lime
where-the-wild-things-roam.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

garden-of-eden.title: Garden of Eden
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling lemon and lemon myrtle
garden-of-eden.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

the-perfect-pear.title: The Perfect Pear
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling pear and wild lime
the-perfect-pear.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

lazy-afternoon.title: Lazy Afternoon
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Lemon with Lemon Myrtle
lazy-afternoon.method: Add a few ice cubes, the lemon disc and gin to the glass, top with Bickford and Sons Lemon with Lemon Myrtle.

pink-flamingo.title: Pink Flamingo
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling Red Grape with Hibiscus
pink-flamingo.method: Pour Vodka into the glass and top with Bickford and Sons Sparkling Red Grape with Hibicus, drop in 2 or 3 red grapes and serve.

sweet-calypso.title: Sweet Calypso
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling Pear with Wild Lime
sweet-calypso.method: Pour vodka over ice and top with Bickford and Sons Sparkling Pear with Wild lime, drop in a lime disc and you're done.

plum-delicious.title: Plum Delicious
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling Apple with Davidson Plum
plum-delicious.method: Add vodka to the glass, top with Bickford and Sons Sparkling Apple with Davidson plum. Garnish with a thin apple slice.

it-must-be-summer.title: It Must Be Summer
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling Red grape and hibiscus
it-must-be-summer.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

pear-blueberry-highball.title: Pear Blueberry Highball
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling pear and wild lime
pear-blueberry-highball.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

lemon-myrtle-mint-spritz.title: Lemon Myrtle Mint Spritz
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling lemon and lemon myrtle
lemon-myrtle-mint-spritz.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

plum-superberry-sling.title: Plum Superberry Sling
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling apple and davidson plum
plum-superberry-sling.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

apricot-apple-fizz.title: Apricot Apple Fizz
ingredients: Bickford and Sons Sparkling apple and davidson plum
apricot-apple-fizz.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

jungle-punch.title: Jungle Punch
jungle-punch.method: Combine everything except the Ginger ale, in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds, fine strain over fresh ice, top with ginger ale, garnish, add straws and serve.

texas-tea.title: Texas Tea
texas-tea.method: Combine everything except the Tonic water, in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds, fine strain over fresh ice, top with Tonic water, garnish, add straws and serve.

bittersweet-symphony.title: Bittersweet Symphony
bittersweet-symphony.method: Combine everything except the Bitter Lemon, in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds, fine strain over fresh ice, top with bitter lemon, crown with crushed ice, garnish, add straws and serve.

catalonia-cocktail.title: Catalonia Cocktail
catalonia-cocktail.method: Combine everything except the tonic water, in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds, fine strain over fresh ice, top with tonic water, garnish, and serve.

summer-of-love.title: Summer of Love
summer-of-love.method: Combine everything except the soda, in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds, fine strain over fresh ice, top with soda water, garnish, add straws and serve.

buckaroo-highball.title: Buckaroo Highball
buckaroo-highball.method: Combine everything except the ginger ale, in a tall glass, stir briefly, fill with ice top with ginger ale, garnish add straws and serve.

maple-and-pear-fizz.title: Maple & Pear Fizz
maple-and-pear-fizz.method: Combine everything except the soda, in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds, fine strain into glass, top with soda water, garnish, add straws and serve.

nineteenth-century-fizz.title: 19th Century Fizz
nineteenth-century-fizz.method: Combine everything except the bitter lemon, in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds, fine strain into glass, top with bitter lemon, garnish, and serve.

honey-ginger-lady.title: Honey Ginger Lady
honey-ginger-lady.method: Combine Bearded Lady bourbon with ice in a highball glass. Add honey and fresh orange juice. Top with Bickford and Sons Ginger Ale and garnish with an orange peel twist.

el-capeador.title: El Capeador
el-capeador.method: Combine tequila, lemon juice and apricot brandy in a cocktail shaker with ice, strain into a Nick and Nora glass. Float in Bickford and sons Bitter Lemon to finish and garnish with a lemon peel curl.

horses-neck.title: Horse's Neck
ingredients: Long Lemon peel garnish to hang

raspberry-blackjack.title: Raspberry Blackjack
raspberry-blackjack.method: Combine 4 fresh raspberries, gin, orange bitters, lemon juice, sugar syrup and a dash of egg white in a cocktail shaker with ice. Strain into a coupette glass and top with Tonic Water. Decorate with 4 drops of aromatic bitters and Garnish with a fresh raspberry skewer.

purple-drank.title: Purple Drank
ingredients: Top with red grape and hibiscus
purple-drank.method: Combine all ingredients except sparkling mixer in a cocktail shaker, shake for 8-10 seconds with ice. strain into glass over fresh ice. top with mixer garnish and serve.

mojito.title: Mojito
mojito.method: Muddle 6 mint leaves into the base of a highball glass, add all ingredients and ice stir. Top with soda water and garnish with mint leaves.

french-gin-and-tonic.title: French Gin and Tonic
french-gin-and-tonic.method: Pour gin and Parfait Amour into an ice filled glass. Top with tonic water and serve with a wedge of lime.

strawberry-breezer.title: Strawberry Breezer
strawberry-breezer.method: Muddle lime wedges in a highball glass. Build vodka, sugar, strawberry liqueur into a shaker with Ice. Strain over muddled lime. Top with soda water.

summer-rose.title: Summer Rose
summer-rose.method: Add ice to carafe and pour all ingredients except the soda. Stir then top with soda and cucumber slices to serve.

melon-soda.title: Melon Soda
melon-soda.method: Build all ingredients over ice, top with tonic water and garnish with lime wedges.

gin-and-tonic.title: Gin & Tonic
gin-and-tonic.method: Add all ingredients to a highball glass, top with ice and stir well. Garnish with a lime wedge.

tom-collins.title: Purple Drank
tom-collins.method: Add all ingredients to a highball glass with ice, top with soda water and stir, garnish with orange slice.

caprioska.title: Caprioska
caprioska.method: Muddle lime and sugar syrup in a shaker, add vodka and ice then shake hard. Pour into tumbler glass and top with soda water.

blue-mule.title: Blue Mule
blue-mule.method: Shake all ingredients except ginger beer in a shaker and strain into an ice filled glass. Top with ginger ale.

blue-steel.title: Blue Steel
blue-steel.method: All all ingredients to a shaker except Bitter lemon, shake for 8-10 seconds and strain over fresh ice. Top with Bitter lemon. Garnish with lemon twist.

strawberry-and-basil-collins.title: Strawberry and Basil Collins
strawberry-and-basil-collins.method: Muddle basil leaves in the base of a shaker, add liquid ingredients except soda and shake well. Strain over fresh ice and top with soda and a sprig of basil.

ready-to-go.title: Ready To Go
ready-to-go.method: Fill glass with ice, add Crème de Cacao and soda then stir and garnish.

peach-sangria.title: Peach Sangria
peach-sangria.method: Add all ingredients to a wine glass and fill with ice. Stir briefly and add Soda water. Garnish with a peach slice.
